preference.name: SUBSCMPL_msd_default_xml_file
preference.preference_description: Specifies the path to the default IPC XML file name for material substance declaration requests. The valid values are: * IPC_1752-2v1.1.xml: IPC 1752-2v1.1 format XML template. * IPC_1752A.xml: IPC 1752A format XML template. This is the default value.
